casebody.data:
Beatrice Monterosso v. Anthony J. Monterosso

Cotter, C. J., Loiselle, Bogdanski, Peters and Healey, Js.

Argued October 9 decision released October 16, 1979 *210Joseph Adinolfi, Jr., with whom was James M. Tanski, for the appellant (defendant). Michael Graham, for the appellee (plaintiff). Per Curiam.

We find no error in the trial court’s, Borden, J., granting the plaintiff’s motion to vacate that court’s, Jacobs, J., order of April 28, 1978, terminating alimony.

There is no error.
